text: Niscaya yara kuphari kareche'o manusake badha diyeche allahara patha [1] theke o masajidula harama theke [2], ya amara karechi sthaniya o bahiragata saba manusera jan'ya samana [3], ara ye sekhane an'yayabhabe â€˜ilahada [4]â€™ tatha dinabirodhi papa kajera icche kare take amara asbadana karaba yantranadayaka sasti
